about_the_game:
Welcome to The Boo Croo! Pick your Boo and participate in a variety of zany 4-player minigames!

--Coopetitive--
Play each minigame how you want! Team up with your friends or turn on them. Each minigame can be won by all players... but each can be lost by all players too!

--Customization--
Unlock new outfits and accessories through gameplay to customize your Boo's appearance. Why not be a doctor with a cowboy hat?

--Local & Online Play--
Play with your friends either locally offline or online! You can even mix local players with online players.
